title: Daomei Xiansheng
synopsis: The film is based on modern culture, with Chinese idiom stories as the main theme, animation as the form of expression, and is composed of different idiom stories. The performances and plot settings of the characters in the film are developed around the meaning of the idiom itself, and a lot of humorous and relaxed performances are incorporated, making the originally profound idioms more innovative and interesting. The protagonist "Mr. Luck" plays various identities in these idiom stories, experiencing different experiences, and staged scenes of relaxed, humorous and profound stories. The children experience the profound connotation of idioms in the wonderful stories, understand the long history and profoundness of Chinese culture, and achieve the purpose of entertaining and entertaining.(translated from tenceng)

title: Qinhuangdao Chuanqi
synopsis: The legend of Qinhuangdao tells that there is a mirror hung on a southern gate in the heavenly court, which can reflect the mortal scenes. After long-term exploration, this mirror gradually gains spirituality. It is sad for the sufferings of the mortal and hung on the mirror. The ribbon on the button also felt the sadness of the mirror, and accompany Jing Ling to tears. (translated from iqiyi)

title: Shaobao Gu
synopsis: The animation tells the daily life of the protagonist "Sao Baogu", tells the truth of life in a lively and humorous way, and has won the love of the majority of Yunnan audiences. It is also the childhood memories of many 80s, 90s, and zeros. (translated from baidu baike)

title: Xing Meng Yuan
synopsis: The story unfolds with a curious Sagittarius coming to Xingmeng Garden, telling how the 12 stars will come to Xingmeng Academy; every member in Xingmeng Garden lives a happy and simple life, and there are many interesting things happening around them. The story. The 12 stars in the story will become good companions. They have different personalities and make a lot of jokes in daily life. When they encounter real crisis or difficulties, they can always unite together and each other Help and use happy energy to solve problems together; the opposite party is the death god and the 7 devil gods who aim to eliminate happy energy... (translated from iqiyi)

title: Cai Yunnan
synopsis: Xiaoxuan is a 9-year-old boy who loves adventure and is always full of novel ideas. One day, he met an elephant (the elephant that came to the real world from Caiyun Township) that fell from the sky, but he did not expect to be taken to Caiyun Township by accident. Caiyun Township was originally a beautiful and peaceful world, but because it was shrouded by the dark power of the Demon King, it was facing a serious crisis. Xiaoxuan is the brave man destined to save Caiyun Township. He must find three sacred soul keys hidden in Caiyun Township in order to defeat the devil and liberate Caiyun Township. (translated from douban)

title: Feng Su Zhan Jing
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

title: Shougong Jie
synopsis: "Handmade Street" virtualizes a fairy tale world built by handmade paper models. In this world, the lovely origami man Xiaomi and his friends live happily... 　　 Let the past and happening childhood become warm; let a piece of paper on the small notebook can create your world. (translated from douban)

title: Luo Cheng Biezhuan
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

title: Kaixin Hanzi
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

title: Yīnyuè qí xiá
synopsis: "Musical Strange Man" tells a story that took place in the magical era of human beings, an era when human imagination and creativity were running wildly! Dongfanglong, Xiaohu, Nangongyan, and Xiaowu are famous young musicians, who are known as musical wonders. Faced with the threat of the monster army to human peace, four young people who love music began their glorious journey of "incarnation of justice and defending peace." While performing all over the world, they use music to meet friends, and use music and singing to influence various evil forces and become little heroes for the people. (translated from douban)

title: Laoying Zhu Xiao Ji Zhi Zhi Dou Fuhao Cheng
synopsis: Lucky Chicken came to Regal City and opened a grocery store. Unexpectedly, the Eagle brothers also arrived here. They opened a big supermarket, pitted against the lucky chickens, and sold fakes. The two sides compete with each other, and new tricks emerge in endlessly. Sometimes they make unique tricks in order to grab new supplies. Lucky Chicken successfully defeated the Eagle Brothers every time.(translated from iqiyi)

details.Japanese: 老鹰抓小鸡之智斗富豪城

title: Laoying Zhua Xiao Ji Zhi Zhengjiu Meishi Cheng
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

title: Laoying Zhua Xiao Ji Zhi Mowang Shijie Da Maoxian
synopsis: The lucky chicken brothers and sisters who live in Lucky Valley were selected by the gods and took on the mission of saving the world, while their natural enemies, the unlucky eagle brothers, became the devil's men under the coercion and lure of the big devil one-eyed monster. In a completely stranger In the world, the protagonists have met many new partners, encountered various enemies, and unfolded one after another imaginative, exciting, and hilarious adventure story. In this wonderful adventure, the protagonists have experienced Through various tests, with firm conviction to realize their commitment to friendship and faith in justice. (translated from iqiyi)

details.Japanese: 老鹰抓小鸡之魔王世界大冒险

title: Dongfang Shaonian Zhi Ji Dou Zhan Che
synopsis: Dongfang Qingtian is an ordinary teenager living in a coastal city with a warm and kind heart. The accidental disappearance of his father many years ago prompted Dongfang Qingtian to protect the people around him and be a responsible man. During summer vacation... . (translated from bilibili)

title: Zhongguo Xiongmao
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

title: Ci Xing Qishi
synopsis: In addition to the Five Elements Continent where humans live, there is also a world of elves called Perpetual Magnetism. The elders of Perpetual Magneto discovered that the evil red knight was trying to destroy the two worlds, so they sent the Magnetar Elf expedition team to the Five Elements Continent to find the Magnetar Knight who could save the two worlds. Unexpectedly, the Magnetar Knights chosen were the sloppy Afeng, Xiangdong who lived in the shadow of his brother who died in the accident, the wealthy daughter Yaling who lacked the company of his parents, and Jasmine who had lost her parents since childhood and had a cowardly personality. The four ordinary students lacked a sense of mission at first, but in the struggle against evil elements, they gradually overcome their shortcomings and worked together to win.(translated from PPTV)

title: Jingling Luobo Wa
synopsis: Lazy radish, wilted radish, dried radish, black radish, green radish, green radish Dubbing: Ding Fang Ding Weiguo Zhang Ni Chang Fangde A Bin Xu Nuohan Introduction: "Elf Carrot Baby" tells a fairy tale about carrots: The carrot family lives in a sunny and hydrated valley of happiness. One day, several members of the turnip family suddenly fell ill and turned into black-hearted turnips. It turned out that all this was a conspiracy, and the struggle caused by it lasted for a long time, many rounds... (translated from youku)

title: Jiandao Shitou Bu
synopsis: In the vast ocean, there is a beautiful island, where smart and brave rocks and his good friends, the little stupid cloth and the little beauty scissors live. On the other side of the forest, there lived the "legion of fools" headed by Brother Dou, who often opposed Shishi and them. Stone led his little friends, united and cooperated, and battled wits and courage with the "legion of fools", and broke down Brother Dou's conspiracy again and again.(translated from  douban)

title: Di Ka Tejing Dui Zhi Shenghua Weiji
synopsis: "Descartes Police Team" is an animation with the theme of eternally classic special police and criminals. It is demonstrated in the form of a series of films. Each single episode presents a wonderful and complete story. The episodes are relatively independent and connected. , Complete the context of the big story in an independent small episode.(translated from iqiyi)

title: Di Ka Tejing Dui Zhi Di Xin Chuanqi
synopsis: The Descartes police team was on vacation in Antarctica, encountered a volcanic eruption, and entered the magical world of the earth. They discovered the crisis in the inner earth, helped the residents of the inner earth find 5 pieces of crustal fragments, and saved the inner earth. (translated from iqiyi)

details.Japanese: 笛卡特警队之地心传奇

title: Mǎlāsōng wángzǐ
synopsis: "Prince of Marathon" is a large-scale animation jointly created by Xiamen Radio and Television Group, Xiamen Audiovisual Publishing House, etc., with a background of Xiamen International Marathon, and a total of 52 episodes. (traslated from bilibili)

title: Kangri Xiao Yingxiong Yang Lai Xi
synopsis: "The Little Anti-Japanese Hero Yang Laixi" is 11 minutes in each episode. It tells the story of the three good friends of the wheat circle, cocoa, and meatballs passing through the time and space tunnel, following Yang Laixi to witness the anti-Japanese anti-Japanese army in the east of Zhejiang, and the Japanese and puppet forces fighting in the Three North areas As well as the process of establishing the red channel, Yang Laixi's heroic and stubborn, witty and witty hero stories are all shown in the film. (translated form iqiyi)

title: Xiao Huli Faming Ji
synopsis: The story takes place in a carrot town full of joyful atmosphere and magical colors by the forest. The protagonist of the story is a smart, lively, thinking and eager fox Xiaodingdong. He was adopted by a caring old rabbit since he was a child. , Since then lived in Carrot Town. With Xiao Dingdong is an equally clever spider Xiao Ba. There are serious old-fashioned and responsible rabbit "Old Mayor" in Carrot Town, and there is a wayward, cute, temperamental rabbit "Little Princess". The superb funny king with well-developed limbs and a not simple mind—"The King of Front Teeth", a shy and well-behaved, cute little rabbit girl—Little Sweet, always awake, always like a cute little fat baby in sleepwalking—sleepwalking Rabbit, likes to quote from the classics, always speaks slowly, the little bookworm-Spectacle Rabbit, the daredevil "Scud"-Wuying Rabbit, who comes and goes without a trace. Xiao Dingdong and everyone are caring. They are good at using their knowledge and imagination to transform the Carrot Town, helping everyone solve problems and build a beautiful and harmonious home.(translated from iqiyi)

title: Shi Er Shengxiao Zhi Wufu Waizhuan
synopsis: After the Chinese zodiac subdued the water spirit, he was able to return to his place in charge of the calendar. After being promoted to the immortal, the Jade Emperor invited a celestial master for the twelve zodiac signs to teach various skills and knowledge. However, the Chinese zodiac signs are inert and reborn after making great contributions, living a free and unlearned life in the heavenly court. This situation was caught by the god Erlang, who was patrolling the heaven, and played the Jade Emperor. At the same time as the tribute, the Jade Emperor received a celestial book. The principles explained in the book shocked and approved the Jade Emperor. In order for the Chinese zodiac signs to help him manage the growth rings of the world for a long time, the Jade Emperor plans to take all the zodiac signs from the "Shen Yu Luo Yan" pool. After receiving the news, Emperor Qingyun and Mo Jie rushed to intercede for the zodiac signs. While the Jade Emperor refused to forgive the zodiac signs, he agreed to Mo Jie’s suggestion to recall the zodiac when his practice was completed through the time plate scoring method. . The Chinese zodiac lost the last life-saving straw, and they were kicked off the earth one by one. The five zodiac signs of the rat, tiger, dragon, sheep and pig came together by chance and landed in a place called Animal Village. The village chief is an elderly turtle. There are also a couple of crows who open a tea house and a nervous doctor Deer. In order to return to the heavens as soon as possible, the five zodiac signs made a series of jokes in the animal village that are ridiculous but crooked, and the story of the five blessings has kicked off...(translated from iqiyi)

title: Shi Er Shengxiao Zhi Yang Yang Deyi
synopsis: The Sheep of the Chinese Zodiac mainly tells the story of the Chinese Zodiac Goat, the Chinese Zodiac Dragon, and the Chinese Zodiac Pig happily spending the Year of the Goat in Zhongjie Mountain. (translated from bilibili)

title: Shi Er Shengxiao Zhi Mashang Jiu Hao
synopsis: Every year the Queen Mother's birthday will hold a flat peach event, which is a year-long event in the fairy world. The harvest of the flat peach orchard directly affects the flat peach feast. Although the administrator of the flat peach orchard has a low position, it is very important. Considering that the zodiac horse is better than the roaring dog in all aspects, the Jade Emperor changed the zodiac horse to Pan Taoyuan. Since then, a series of wit and brave, funny stories have occurred in Pantaoyuan. (translated from youku)

title: Shi Er Shengxiao Zhi Long Xing Tianxia
synopsis: The Chinese zodiac dragon, the zodiac pig and the zodiac dog made a big noise at the Pantao banquet. They accidentally smashed the Kowloon Luminous Cup. The nine dragons on the Luminous Cup turned into nine dragon balls and fell into the world. The Jade Emperor sent the zodiac dragon and the other three people to the mortal world to find the dragon ball and atone for the crime. Therefore, the zodiac dragon and the other three embarked on a long journey to find nine dragon balls. They went through nine adventures and finally succeeded(translated from youku)

title: Shi Er Shengxiao Zhi Mashang Jiu Hao
synopsis: Every year the Queen Mother's birthday will hold a flat peach event, which is a year-long event in the fairy world. The harvest of the flat peach orchard directly affects the flat peach feast. Although the administrator of the flat peach orchard has a low position, it is very important. Considering that the zodiac horse is better than the roaring dog in all aspects, the Jade Emperor changed the zodiac horse to Pan Taoyuan. Since then, a series of wit and brave, funny stories have occurred in Pantaoyuan. (translated from youku)

title: Shi Er Shengxiao Zhi Tianxia Shu Tu
synopsis: There is a sky-reaching tree in Happy Town. This tree is a "ladder" linking the world. The zodiac rabbit is in accordance with the Jade Emperor’s will to assist the father-in-law to guard the sky-tree. He also made a head-catcher in the happy town to protect the happy town to spend safely and happily. Year of the Rabbit. The Zodiac Rabbit became a member of Happy Town, and got acquainted with many small town residents with full of personality, such as the victorious martial arts master Da Hei, and the cat who wants to be a fairy. The Zodiac Rabbit started a wonderful and interesting experience in Happy Town. (translated from youku)

title: Tao Mi Donghua
synopsis: The film tells the story of a little boy Tao Mi encounters various problems in his daily life, and gradually learns relevant scientific knowledge through studying with a Ph.D. ()translated from baidu baike

title: Zhonghua Minsu Gushi Zhi Jiangnan Xilie
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

details.Japanese: 中华民俗故事之江南系列

title: Shu Xian
synopsis: The protagonist Luka is the guardian of the books. She conquered the four little elves in the study. They lived in the home of a book-loving grandfather Feng in Pengcheng and jointly guarded the books. This film fictionalizes a story that takes place in a book. Through rich imagination, tortuous plots, and characters with distinctive characters, the protagonist's sense of responsibility and the virtue of persevering in death are reflected. Stimulate the audience's interest in books and cultural knowledge, encourage the audience to love books, love to read, pursue truth, goodness and beauty, and make up for the lack of humanistic spirit in contemporary society. (traslated from bilibili)

title: Se La
synopsis: In the depths of the big forest, there live a group of cute little elves whose names are called "Sera". 　　 No one knows their origins, no one knows how long they have lived here. They are colorful, kind and lovely. I heard that they are color elves, in charge of all the colors in your eyes. With them, the world will be colorful. 　　 The witch in the forest-Suan Dou Po, is a nasty fellow. She tried to take the erotica as her own and tried her best. Frame them with crappy magic. However, the sexies can always rely on their bravery and wisdom to overcome dangers. They are defending their lovely home, Sela City, and they live happily with their partners. 　　 Kids, maybe they still live in the big forest, otherwise why is our world so colorful? Open your eyes and observe the beauty of this world! (translated from douban)

title: Shenyong Meng Meng Tuan
synopsis: The story is about 12 animal elves living in the Dream Villa, guarding a 12-color dream tree that condenses the good wishes of time. The Dark Lord Sado steals the dream energy from the tree and destroys people’s dreams. The 12 elves are composed of Dream Dream Group began to fight against it and help people protect the environment and realize their dream story. (translated form iqiyi)

title: Jisu Zhi Xing
synopsis: The protagonist Xiaoxing is just an ordinary middle school student, but he has been working tirelessly to realize his dream. By chance, he discovered that Feng Ming, the school's physics teacher, turned out to be a genius mechanic from twenty years ago. After a lot of hard work, Xiaoxing and his partner got the help of Teacher Fengming and embarked on a journey to compete for their dreams. (translated form bilibili)

title: Xiao Laohu
synopsis: The family story is the main part of the cartoon. The little tiger grows up in his family and improves his personality. At the same time, he plays happily with his little friends. Animation is based on people's values towards life. It guides children how to deal with interpersonal relationships, understand the importance of unity, and learn generosity and tolerance at the same time. Each episode will revolve around a problem around Little Tiger. With the help of family and friends, Little Tiger Carlu finally solved these problems while also understanding a lot of truth. (translated form iqiyi)

title: Tiantian Hao Xiguan
synopsis: "Good Habits Everyday" is a 57-episode animated series. The story happened to the classmates of Class 4 (3) of Erlong Road Primary School. It takes 5 minutes and each episode talks about a good habit in life. All the characters in this film are square, which is rarely seen in previous cartoons. What's more interesting is that all the dubbing in this film is done by mouth, including the sound of people walking, etc., all the motion effects and even the music in the film have a very special effect. (translated form bilibili)

title: Zhang Xiao He Donghua
synopsis: The office building is a box, the office is also a box, the home is also a box, and lunch is also a box lunch. Everything, including cars, elevators, documents, tables, chairs, books, etc., is a box, one box is surrounded by a box. Because everyone lives and moves in one box after another, people also become boxes. This is our box world. Everyone outside wants to enter, but everyone inside wants to get out. Zhang Xiaohe is a member of our box world, representing every local white-collar office worker. He has a simple personality, good at working overtime, no car, no house, no money, no girlfriend, squeezed by his boss, and often bullied by his colleagues. But he still has his own ideals and lives a strong and optimistic life. In reality, almost everyone can find their own shadow in Zhang Xiaohe. So when we create this comic, it is very easy to resonate with the audience, and guide the audience to have fun while teasing life, encouraging them to open their boxes and find their own happiness.(translated from tenceng)

title: Jingji Xue Yuan
synopsis: The dark economic organization Ai Clone is trying to control the mountain city! On the surface, they provide citizens with extremely low-priced goods and services, but in reality they are malicious dumping and monopolizing the market! They severely disrupted the economic order of the mountain city and brought unprecedented disasters to people's lives! Several students who have just entered the MBA academy use the economic knowledge they have learned in the school to fight against the love clones of the dark forces. Can they shoulder the burden of saving the world and restore the economy of the mountain city? (translated form douban)

title: Ertong Kexue Guan
synopsis: Beibei, Poirot and their three good partners, in order to collect popular science knowledge from all over the world, piloted a scientific flying vehicle to start a magical journey of exploration. The magical things or phenomena in each episode of the story help to broaden children's horizons and stimulate interest in learning and using knowledge. (translated from bilibili)

title: Tonghua Meng Gongchang
synopsis: This film shows the audience a fairy tale world that is very different from the real world. Through the stories between gods, elves and small animals, it fully expresses family love, friendship and other beautiful emotions in the world. (translated from iqiyi)

title: Mùtou cūn
synopsis: The cartoon "Wood Village" is developed from the perspective of a little girl Tintin, telling a series of stories about the symbiosis of man and nature. The quiet Muju Village is located in the depths of the big forest. The villagers have long been integrated with nature, and each has its own unique plants. The dexterous shower head, cute tomato Mimi, smart starfruit Xiaobo, tall banana Bobo, lead a free campus life under the leadership of teacher Aka with roses. After a series of twists and turns, the smelly family that was newly moved from the village grew plants on their heads and merged into Muju Village. Soon, engineers from the city disturbed the peace in the village, intending to build a lunar rocket launch base. There was a blackout in the city’s energy crisis. Teacher Aka led the children to rescue. (translated from iqiyi)

title: Yuu Eryuan Da Zhong Xiaoban
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

title: Yesheng Dongwu Baobao
synopsis: Five animal explorers will introduce children to various wild animals and plants, geography, climate change and other natural phenomena in nature in a variety of ways to satisfy children's curiosity about the beautiful and wonderful nature. ()translated from bilibili

title: Bafeite Shenmi Julebu
synopsis: The correct concept of wealth should be cultivated from the early stage when children have a concept of money. "Buffett Mystery Club" uses vivid examples to teach everyone his successful financial management experience in the form of animation. At the same time, the investment concept in cartoons can also bring new inspiration to many adults. Buffett personally guided the production of this film, and explained the difficult and boring investment concepts in a very vivid way, so that everyone can become an expert in investment and financial management! Four children with different personalities are designed in this film. They replace real children in the cartoon to make venture capital investment and realize the interactive effect on and off the screen. The audience will follow the four protagonists to think about all kinds of complicated and thorny issues, and grow together to become a true investment and financial expert!(translated from baidu baike)

title: Blue Period
synopsis: Second-year high school student Yatora Yaguchi is bored with his normal life. He studies well and plays around with his friends, but in truth, he does not enjoy either of those activities. Bound by norms, he secretly envies those who do things differently. That is until he discovers the joy of drawing. When he sees a painting made by a member of the Art Club, Yatora becomes fascinated with the colors used in it. Later, in an art exercise, he tries to convey his language without words but instead through painting. After that experience, Yatora finds himself so invested in art that he decides that it is what he wants to do for a living. But there stand multiple obstacles in his way: his parents who are hesitant over his unique choices, his more experienced peers, and the study of a subject much deeper than he initially expected.

title: Kuaile Xinxin
synopsis: "Happy Heart" is an animated series designed for the growth of preschool children aged 3-6. Through the perspective of Xinxin and its friends, this animation explores children's social emotional characteristics, such as selfishness, sharing, unity, friendship, etc. And using these emotional characteristics as clues, through the heart and the experience of friends, a positive interpretation of the various challenges and difficulties that a child has to face in a complex and changeable world, set an example for small audiences, and attract children through rich content Interest, stimulate unlimited potential, cultivate good social adaptability(translated from iqiyi)

title: Donghan Yanyi
synopsis: After Wang Mang usurped the throne at the end of the Western Han Dynasty, Liu Xiu led thirty-six generals to fight for recklessness, tackle key problems, and restore the Han Dynasty. ()translated from baidu baike

title: Shui Qian Gushi
synopsis: The Children’s Bedtime Stories are specially prepared for children before going to bed, with fairy tales as the theme. The plot of the story generally does not have too intense plots, and most of them end with a happy ending. Not only allows the baby to experience the plot in the story, but also makes the baby feel a sense of security, and let the baby know that the baby is accompanied and protected by his parents even when he sleeps. (translated from iqiyi)

title: Shuo Yue Yingxiong Chuan
synopsis: The film is adapted from the historical novel "Said Yue Quan Biography" written by Qian Cai of the Qing Dynasty. It tells the story of patriot Yue Fei and a group of daring brothers resisting aggression and defending the country together during the Song Dynasty. The colorful and animated version of the Song Dynasty world shows distinctive personalities, such as Yue Fei's boldness, Niu Gao's humor, Yue Yun's recklessness, and Qin Hui's treacherous. (translated from bilibili)

title: Jietou Zuqiu
synopsis: "Street Football" is about a few boarders in the school and some friends who love football outside the school. They spontaneously formed a street football team and met friends from all over the world who love street football through the Internet, so they sprouted the creation of the street football World Cup. idea. 　　Unfortunately, the mayor and citizens were very disgusted with street football from the beginning. They felt that football disturbed public order and made noise. The people who played football were all hooligans and bad boys in the society. So they tried every means to ban football activities and dispatched police to search for these children. 　　 But no matter how difficult the situation is, the children always maintain firm confidence and passion for street football. Their spirit of unity and friendship not only won one game, but also defeated those who hindered them time and time again. Finally, with the support and help of coaches and enthusiasts, these children finally turned their dreams into reality and opened the curtain of the Street Football World Cup (translated from iqiyi)

title: Kuaile Chengzhang
synopsis: The main content of this play is the popularization and promotion of school etiquette, family etiquette and social etiquette. Through the strong cooperation of elementary school students with school counselors, the stories of helping small partners such as Xiaotao and Xiaofeng who do not consciously learn and observe civilized etiquette to grow up, vividly demonstrate the cordial and warm greetings in daily learning and life, and the solemn and standard Young Pioneers Etiquette, as well as a friendly home atmosphere, harmonious neighbourhood relations, and refreshing national traditions, bring children into the hall of good interpersonal relations and civilized etiquette.(translated from bilibili)

title: Huan Yue Zuofang
synopsis: This play takes the life of Xiaoqiang, the owner of the happy workshop and bar as the main line, and expresses the joy, anger, sadness and happiness in the daily life of ordinary people through role interpretation. It is tuned in a fashionable, novel, lively and humorous comedy style.. (translated from bilibili)

title: Kuai Yue Jiating
synopsis: The story takes place in a certain city in China in the 21st century-Candy Sea. An old Wu head (grandfather) who is often confused as a "god of sleep"; Wu Dalong (dad) who is a safety supervisor who often causes safety accidents; Qiao Sixi (mom) who has exploded hair and is known for his patience; Candy Sea Elementary School Student, the erring king Wu Jiale (son); a genius boy plus a melancholy Wu Jiamei (daughter); finally, there is a two with a pacifier, always imitating others and with a natural cynical rock cell Year-old BABY Wu Jiaxin. These six people formed an ordinary family in the city of Candy --- Wu's family. In this family, the mother's inadequate financial management often caused economic difficulties; Wu Jiale and Wu Jiamei’s "fighting" between brothers and sisters. It constitutes a ridiculous event in the story, but the ending can always bring you deep touch and endless joy. (translated from douban)

title: Shenqi Da Maoxian
synopsis: Kaka’s spacecraft had a malfunction and was forced to land on the earth. The beautiful earth made Kaka fall in love with this place and became best friends with Lele Duodo. Lele has a lively and reckless personality, and he is clever and witty. Because of this, the two brothers and sisters often quarrel because of their different views on things. On this day, Lele became bored with Chinese characters because he was punished by his teacher to copy texts, and quarreled with Duoduo about the origin of Chinese characters. In order to calm the quarrel between his brother and sister because of their different understanding of Chinese characters, Kaka decided to use alien technology to help. They went back to the ancient times, revisited the origin and development of Chinese characters, and the magical adventure began.(translated from iqiyi)

title: Shengxiao Shan Chuanqi
synopsis: The animation "Legend of the Zodiac Mountain" is produced in three dimensions, telling the fantasy adventure process of young animal teenagers living in modern times. The fantasy story includes the dragon king who loves to drink and the evil wolf and dragon, etc., through the brave adventure process, Enlightenment children dare to do. The storyline is humorous and entertaining. Let's have a big adventure with the little animals! (translated from tenceng)

title: Binggan Jing Zhang
synopsis: The story of Cookie Sheriff takes place in a magical food kingdom-"Biscuit City". Everything in the Biscuit City is made up of food, such as the Cake Palace, the Candy Boots Police Station, the Popcorn Cinema, the Milk River... Living in this beautiful town is a biscuit man who is kind and cute in nature. The supreme ruler of Biscuit City is the Biscuit Queen integrated with the sacred key. She has cute croissant braids, exquisite cream skirt, elegant aristocratic temperament and the "little" willfulness that a girl of this age has. The biggest victim of this is the guardian of our venerable Cookie City-Cookie Sergeant and his partner Cookie Cookie. In order to meet the strange requirements of the little queen, the sheriff and Cookie are busy with each other. At the same time, they must always be alert to the threat from the sugar desert-the three brothers bandit group. The three moldy biscuit brothers-the old man with a moldy face, the second child with a moldy face, and the third with a moldy head, are the greatest threat to the peace of Biscuit City. Moldy face has always coveted the sacred key in the Queen's hand that symbolizes the dominance of Biscuit City, vainly trying to take it as his own, occupying Biscuit City in one fell swoop, in order to avenge the old king who exiled them. For this reason, he kept inventing props in the spittoon spacecraft, planning a conspiracy, and preparing to initiate a key capture operation. The only people who can fight the three brothers are our brave Cookie Sergeant and Cookie Sergeant who is good at inventing. With the "help" of magical props such as cookie invented upside down four guns, police car robots, and universal remote controls, the sheriff(translated from iqiyi)

title: Binggan Jing Zhang Zhi Leyuan Jihua
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

title: An Yuan Xiaozi
synopsis: The story in the play takes place in Anyuan, Pingxiang, Jiangxi in the 1920s. The protagonist Nan Yazi is a smart and righteous kid king who is only 12 years old. Uncle Liu in the play is an underground party member and an enlightenment who influenced Nanyao to embark on the revolutionary road. He was later killed by evil forces. Under the guidance of the revolutionary enlightenment thought, he led a group of compassionate and righteous young heroes. With the help of the "magic power" burst out from the red scarf stained with the blood of revolutionary martyrs, he launched a thrilling story of struggle against the evil forces.(translated from douban)

title: Lei Bi Baobei Yu Ha Pai Leyuan
synopsis: The twin sisters Renee and Binnie of the Universe Police School tracked Monia to Hapai in order to find evidence of the crime of the evil witch Monia. I just came to Hapai planet. Due to poor driving skills, the spacecraft of the two sisters collided with the spacecraft of Monia. Fortunately, the two sisters were safe. The place where the two sisters’ spacecraft fell is called Hapai Paradise, where they found that the creatures here are very interesting and cute toys. The knowledgeable uncle Bunana the tortoise, the hospitable little Sasa the hedgehog, and the artistically talented zebra Doloro... and little Sasa built a house overnight for the two sisters Renee Binnie. The two sisters told everyone that the witch Monia was to destroy the toy. (translated from douban)

title: Zhonghua Da Jiangtan
synopsis: The Chinese nation, as a nation with a long history, has accumulated noble traditional virtues and excellent national spirit in the millennium history of civilization, and has produced many historical stories, which have been passed down in various ways. However, with the diversification of communication methods, the influence of external cultural transmission channels and means is constantly strengthening, and the influence of historical stories is constantly weakening. The phenomenon of Chinese people not understanding China's long and brilliant history and culture is becoming more and more intense among young people. (translated from bilibili)

title: Chong Chong Jihua
synopsis: In the vast universe, there is a magical planet. From a distance, this planet looks like a lollipop that is constantly flowing with honey. The insects can't wait to lick it in their mouths. The surface of the planet is light blue honey water, like... (translated from bilibili)

title: Senlin Yizu
synopsis: Auntie Chicken, King Tiger and other animals live in the forest. They live happily in the forest every day. Even if they encounter various difficulties, the friends in the forest will help each other and encourage each other to get through the difficulties. (translated from iqiyi)

title: A Nuo Gou Yu Kai Rui Mao
synopsis: This film presents the various farce between the two protagonists, Arnold Dog and Kerry Cat, in the form of silent films, and presents the vivid image of the protagonist to the audience. Tell stories with "gimmicks" one by one. Its story is straightforward and concise. Show the interesting life between the two protagonists in a relaxed, humorous and exaggerated way of expression. The plot is unexpected, but reasonable. Suitable for audiences of multiple ages. The form of pantomime it adopts completely relies on humor and comical movements instead of dialogue. The concise and intuitive action language will present an extremely vivid and deep impression to the audience. (translated from douban)

title: Jin Luohao
synopsis: A long time ago, a small island shaped like a conch stood on the blue sea. This small island was called "Golden Conch". There are happy conch families living on the island. They live in a conch-shaped house.. (translated from bilibili)

title: Ya He Wen Li De Yiwen
synopsis: This film presents the various farce between the two protagonists, Arnold Dog and Kerry Cat, in the form of silent films, and presents the vivid image of the protagonist to the audience. Tell stories with "gimmicks" one by one. Its story is straightforward and concise. Show the interesting life between the two protagonists in a relaxed, humorous and exaggerated way of expression. The plot is unexpected, but reasonable. Suitable for audiences of multiple ages. The form of pantomime it adopts completely relies on humor and comical movements instead of dialogue. The concise and intuitive action language will present an extremely vivid and deep impression to the audience.(translated from douban)

title: Shuxue Long
synopsis: Primary school student Pippi and his classmates Xiaoping, Xiaowei, and Xiaoyao visited Dr. Qiu together, hoping to learn new knowledge from Dr. Qiu during the summer vacation. A group of people accidentally touched the time machine invented by Dr. Qiu, and Pippi and his group traveled through time and space to the ancient dinosaur age! There, Pippi and others used the mathematical knowledge they had learned to help the dinosaurs solve many problems. At the same time, they also discovered many secrets of the dinosaur era. In living together, the four children overcame some of their original shortcomings, learned to cooperate with each other, and became good friends with the dinosaurs. (translated form dfouban)

title: Longgu Shan
synopsis: In 500,000 years, a group of apes migrated from Nihewan to Longgushan in Zhoukoudian for a long time. They lived on Longgushan among the apes, hyenas and saber-toothed tigers, and they started their struggle to seize their livelihood. Because of the abuse of hyenas, the ape-man lost the fire on which to live. Everyone had to wait for the return of Kuo, who went to the volcanoes to get fire. The Kuo brother who smoothly got the fire was hit by hyenas and saber-toothed tigers. But at this moment, Brother Kuo's unusual son was born! Before his death, the Kuo brother gave a final confession... Since then, the ape-man collective headed by Yuan Yuan has resisted strongly in order to defend his hometown under the pressure of hyenas.(translated from douban)

title: Yunlong Chuanqi Zhi Jiulong Zhan Ji
synopsis: In ancient times, the Yellow Emperor fought against Chi You and finally captured Chi You alive. A demon named Tiangou escaped by chance. After hiding for many years, he returned to the world for revenge. Unexpectedly, the world is in the Shang Dynasty, and Zhuan Xu is no longer alive. The Tengu failed to avenge, and gathered a group of little monsters to do evil in the Pengcheng area. Zhuan Xu's great-great-grandson Zhuankeng (Peng Zu) and the Yunlong Mountain God led the people of Pengcheng to resist the demons, and finally sealed him at the bottom of the lake. After Peng Zu died, a piece of his Nine Dragons jade pendant turned into a little dragon god, and he continued to fight for justice.(translated form douban)

title: Kuangshi Qi Xia
synopsis: This film tells the story of the teenager arresting Su Kuang. The unique secret book "Taiyi Ce" reappeared in the world and triggered martial arts disputes. In the process of searching for "Taiyi Ce", Su Kuang and his companions overcame difficulties and continued to grow. They finally uncovered the conspiracy of the careerist and settled the dispute between the rivers and lakes. (translated from douban)

title: Yu Qi Lin Gushi Hui
synopsis: Tell the classic Chinese stories, lead the children to broaden their horizons in relaxation and happiness, increase knowledge, and cultivate good social skills. (translated form iqiyi)

title: Nu Nu Duo De Shujia
synopsis: This large-scale educational series is mainly planned by the father of a five-year-old child with the original intention of caring for the child. Tell a truth and common sense of life through each short story. At the end of the film set, a narration will be added to explain the truth in detail. Involving civil defense knowledge, traffic safety, safe use of electricity, water, gas, etc. in the home (translated from iqiyi)

title: You Rui Lixian Ji
synopsis: Jura Adventures, what kind of partner Jura met and what kind of story? Children, let us experience those wonderful and exciting adventure stories with Yourui. (translated from iqiyi)

title: Wudi Youyou
synopsis: Youyou admires Masked Superman very much, and ideally becomes a man as powerful as Masked Superman. His best partners Pippi and Lulu are also super fans of Masked Superman. In this novel town, surprises and frictions occur every day. The protagonist Youyou lives here happily with his family and friends. (translated from iqiyi)

title: Shinkansen Henkei Robo Shinkalion Z the Animation
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

details.Japanese: 新幹線変形ロボ シンカリオンZ THE ANIMATION

title: Ding Laotou He Jiong GG
synopsis: The first domestically produced online Tucao animation, which integrates cultural styles such as chaotic entry, KUSO, spoof, and nonsense. The two facial makeup characters sing and play together, tease each other, talk and answer, and ask and answer each other, complementing each other. Old man Ding-a classic graffiti of childhood born in the 1970s and 1980s, 囧 GG-a cultural symbol that is crazy and popular in the E era. Cartoons based on these two characters are destined to be absurd. The two acted passionately, spoofed wildly, and traversed all kinds of worlds without rules. As a domestically produced original cartoon image specially created for young people born in the 80s and 90s, "Old Man Ding and Ji GG" is eclectic and simple, thinking about what you think and tickling you. Here, you can nostalgia without any scruples, speak with hatred and preaching, and fight to defend your youth! (translated from tenceng)

title: Xi Xiao Yijia Qin
synopsis: The wheat circle who just entered junior high school likes to be clever, but his grades are not very satisfactory. Mr. Mak is a workaholic and has been looking forward to promotion. Mrs. Mai is enthusiastic and easy to learn. The gluttonous and sleepy puppy is the "pistachio" of the family. Suddenly, the perfect cousin, Coco, is the enemy of the wheat circle. Five family members with different personalities collided and rubbed against each other, triggering hilarious and warm stories one after another. The stories reflect the growth of young people and the importance of a harmonious family. (translated from iqiyi)

title: Bo Bo Lixian Ji
synopsis: On Moon Island, the protagonist Bobo lives happily with his four friends, Xiaobei, Xiaohai, and Xiaoxing. Popo’s father had been studying abroad for many years and contacted his son through letters, but the letters were suddenly interrupted. Bobo was worried about his father, so he embarked on a journey to find his father with his friends. They found that connecting Popo’s father’s letters together was a route to a mysterious country. This secret was also discovered by bad merchants on Moon Island, which made their already difficult journey to find their father even more difficult. However, under the leadership of the brave Bobo, this group of lads battled wits and courage with the bad businessman and overcome all difficulties. The friendship between the partners is getting deeper and deeper, and they gradually become more responsible, and they continue their adventure more firmly(TRANSLATED FROM IQIYI)

title: Zhiduoxing Jimu
synopsis: The old starling general came to the town and wanted to choose the "Happy Wisdom Stars" combination for the king! Everyone is thinking about who they want to team up with. Everyone decided to hold a competition and the first place player would team up with Yoshimu. In the end, Ziluo and Kumei won and became a group with Ji Mu. At the same time, the villains Thunder and Rat Brothers also formed a group with the Locust Overlord, and the competitions of the two teams revolved around the big and small events of the town. Under Yoshimu's leadership, defeated the Thunder Dragon team. (translated from iqiyi)

title: Xiao Chaoren Dui
synopsis: The film uses "Quick Spaceship" as the main scene, telling a science fiction story with the theme of ecological civilization and technological health. Human health and viruses are an eternal contradiction... The virus king is a saboteur in the universe. Legend has it that a long time ago, the Virus Demon once attacked the North Star, but Mr. Crack quickly attacked and defeated the Virus Demon. For unknown reasons, Mr. Crack did not eliminate the virus demon at the time, and then adopted a bear cub. The virus demon disappeared. Crackstar is a companion star orbiting North Star. Mr. Crack is the leader of Crack. Teacher Yan is Mr. Crack's assistant. Crack Bear is the adopted son of Mr. Crack. Crackle has a protective shield (called "light shield"), and the light energy comes from Polaris (more than 2000 times brighter than the sun). Suddenly one day, a large-scale virus appeared on the far earth. Crack Bear hopes that Mr. Crack will send him to solve it, but Mr. Crack and Teacher Ying have concerns. While Mr. Crack and Teacher Yan were not paying attention, Xiao Xiong carried the Crack 2 spacecraft to the earth secretly. However, the earth's virus outbreak is a conspiracy of the devil. This is his strategy of turning the tiger away from the mountain. I wanted to open Mr. Crack, but he didn't expect Crack Bear to drive the spacecraft away from Crack. This is in the arms of the virus devil. As soon as the bear bear spacecraft left Quick Buster, a large number of viruses began to besieged Quick Buster, and dark viruses were dispatched to intercept the light source of Polaris (such as the "total solar eclipse"), so that Quick Buster lost the protection of the light shield. Mr. Crack had to release his own energy to activate the "Light Shield" to protect the Quick Buster, which also prevented Mr. Crack from leaving easily. As soon as the little bear arrived on Earth, he was attacked by a powerful virus variant-a virus monster. In the midst of a panic, Mr. Crack told Little Bear that this was a conspiracy of the Virus Devil, but he was also prepared. There is a mysterious box on the crack 2 spacecraft, which contains three magic pills, each with three different abilities. Get the magic pill to gain the superhuman power to defeat the virus monster. However, these three pills were accidentally eaten by three teenagers who were hit by mistake... As a result, Crack Bear and the three children started a defense war against the virus monsters. This is a war to defend life, health and homeland ecological civilization... (translated from tenceng)

title: Xiao Ciwei Lan Dou Dou
synopsis: The background of the story takes place on a huge and boundless forest island floating in a galaxy far and far away from the earth. Like the human world, this forest island has streets, schools, shopping malls, and strange creatures. The public toilets where you run, the relaxing chairs that give people a massage, and the endless plants that can move. The plants and trees in this magic planet are full of humanity. The flowers and trees here always attract attention. (translated from iqiyi)

title: Kaixin Nangua Cun
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

title: Wai Xing Ren Xiao Nao Nao
synopsis: The harp, crooked, and small noise from the mushroom planet originally wanted to occupy the beautiful earth, but was moved by the kindness and happiness of the Nunudo family, and was attracted by the beauty of the earth and the food that my mother cooked, so I decided to settle on the earth on. Because the living habits are different from those of the people on the earth, chirping, crooked, and small troubles make some jokes every day. Because of these three extraterrestrial life treasures, Mango Town laughed constantly every day!(translated from youku)

title: Fengyun Qi Dui
synopsis: Qiqi Town, which advocates sports, is about to usher in the "Qiqi Games" held every ten years. After layers of selection, the Fengyun team represented by Xiaolinghu and the Shanhai team represented by Tricolor Dogs entered the finals. Because the Fengyun team members are weak in physical fitness and the game is at a disadvantage, Xiao Linghu went to find the secret to win. Although he did not find the secret, he learned the mystery between meteorological knowledge and sports competition. In the following table tennis, tennis, discus throw, badminton and other competitions, the Fengyun team cleverly used meteorological knowledge, and through the united efforts of the players, they finally won the championship of the Games. (translated from iqiyi)

title: Yule Zongdongyuan
synopsis: Jiangnan and Grasshopper use the witty Flash animation to tell the little jokes vividly, and the interesting background sound effects are really exciting. (translated from youku)

title: Xianggu Teqin Dui Zhi Guoshu Xiao Yingxiong
synopsis: The film uses anthropomorphic techniques to tell how small mushrooms fight carrots. (translated form tenceng)

details.Japanese: 香菇特勤队之果蔬小英雄

title: Xianggu Teqin Dui Ni Xi Xianggu Zhen
synopsis: The turnip family conspired to destroy the mushroom planet, and ended up harming others against themselves. After accidentally blowing up their turnip planet, they could only settle on the mushroom planet. As the protector of the mushroom planet, the chaos, wow, and Qiqi of the mushroom special team forgave and accept the carrot people, hoping that they will get back to the right. However, the turnip man still used various conspiracies to occupy the mushroom star, the mushroom special team resolved one by one, and finally drove the turnip man out of the mushroom star. (translated from tenceng)

details.Japanese: 香菇特勤队逆袭香菇镇

title: Xianggu Teqin Dui Zhi Gangtie Xingqiu De Mimi
synopsis: After a lot of trouble, Shiitake Town finally ushered in a peaceful and peaceful time. Nano, Qiqi, and Vega are riding a brand new spacecraft, preparing to leave Shiitake Town to explore the vast and unknown universe. (translated from tenceng)

details.Japanese: 香菇特勤队之钢铁星球的秘密

title: Xianggu Teqin Dui Zhi Huluobo Ruqin
synopsis: There is a legendary mushroom special team on the mushroom planet: noisy, wow, Qiqi. When they returned to Shitake Star from the earth, they found that the entire Shitake Star was occupied by the neighboring Carrot Stars. The Carrot Queen led his men to do evil on Shitake Star and enslaved the people of Shitake Planet. The trio rescued the mayor of Mushroom, led the people of Mushroom to rise up, and defeated the conspiracy of the Queen of Carrot with wisdom, and withstood the test of friendship, and finally won. (translated from tenceng)

details.Japanese: 香菇特勤队之胡萝卜入侵

title: Xianggu Teqin Dui Zhi Yingxiong Guilai
synopsis: No synopsis information has been added to this title. Help improve our database by adding a synopsis here.

details.Japanese: 香菇特勤队之英雄归来

title: Ben Ben You Youji
synopsis: The little girl Coco accidentally ran into the stray elf, stupid, and took it home. Under the care of the Coco family, Ben Ben lived a happy life, and at the same time began his exploration and adventure in the human world. Coco and Benben have experienced all kinds of things in life together and understood a lot of truths. In happy times, they grew up day by day.(translated from iqiyi)
